## TimeSpan.equals() method

Returns a value that indicates whether two specified instances of TimeSpan are equal.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static equals(t1: TimeSpan, t2: TimeSpan): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  t1 | TimeSpan | The first time interval to compare. |
|  t2 | TimeSpan | The second time interval to compare. |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean

boolean - true if the values of t1 and t2 are equal; otherwise, false.
